item.description:
IMPORTANT NOTE: This weekend, the MBTA is doing repair work between Harvard and and Alewife stations. If you are planning on taking the Red Line to Davis tomorrow, you will have to get off at Harvard and take a shuttle bus up to Davis Square. Allow yourself an extra 20 minutes, please. (Bummer) 

+++++++++++++++++++

Join us for a second chance at seeing the new Bond flick "Skyfall." (Cool man!)

The Somerville Theater is located just micro seconds, from the Davis Sq Red Line T stop. (So easy!) 

There are a few parking lots in the area as well as street parking. Give yourself a extra time to find a place to park; Davis is popular on Sunday's. (Not too bad) 

Show up time is 4:30, flick starts at 4:45. Watch for updates as the start time my change. (I am reliable) 

After the flick, we will head around the corner to Flatbreads for dinner and socailizing. (Yum!) 

That's all there is to it! (Nice!) 

Happy T-Day!!!
item.how_to_find_us: Look at my profile pictures, show up early and look for me in the lobby. I'll be wearing a black jeans and a green, puffy down jacket.If you can't find me, start asking people "Are you Shane?"
item.name: Skyfall (second chance)
